entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , St. Stephen
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:58 AM AST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. Stephen 06:00 AM AST Wednesday 01 March 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa rising
Humidity: 93 %

Wind: ENE 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light early this morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Wednesday 01 March 2023
